mapper.select: /* PoUserHistMngMapper.getDetailMappData */ SELECT TOP 1 JOBS_ID AS JobsId , PROCESS_CD AS ProcessCd , PROCESS_NM AS ProcessNm , CONVERT(CHAR(19), START_DT, 21) AS StartDt FROM TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST WHERE START_DT < (SELECT TOP 1 START_DT FROM TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST WHERE JOBS_ID = #{jobsId}) AND STTUS != 5 AND TRGET_AT = 1 ORDER BY START_DT DESC
mapper.insert:
/* PoUserHistMngMapper.insertRetryInfo */
INSERT INTO TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_RETRY ( RETRY_TRGET_ID , JOB_ID , APPLY_AT , REGISTER_ID , REG_DT) VALUES( #{targetId} , #{jobsId} , 1 , #{txUserId} , GETDATE())
mapper.update: /* PoUserHistMngMapper.updateTargetJobInfo */ UPDATE TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST SET TRGET_AT = 1 WHERE JOBS_ID = (SELECT RETRY_TRGET_ID FROM TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST WHERE JOBS_ID = #{jobsId})
mapper.select: /* PoUserHistMngMapper.getPoUserHistDetailList */ SELECT JOBS_ID AS Id , CMPNY_CD AS CmpnyCd , CMPNY_NM AS CmpnyNm , PROCESS_CD AS ProcessCd , PROCESS_NM AS processNm , BOT_ID AS BotId , BOT_NM AS BotNm , ENVRN_ID AS EnvrnId , ENVRN_NM AS EnvrnNm , (SELECT TOP 1 CD_NM FROM TB_CMMN_CD WHERE CLS_CD = 15 AND CD = STTUS) AS Sttus , CASE WHEN SOURC = 0 THEN '수동' WHEN SOURC = 1 THEN '시간 트리거' WHEN SOURC = 2 THEN '에이전트' WHEN SOURC = 3 THEN '큐 트리거' END AS Sourc , TRGET_AT AS TrgetAt , RETRY_TRGET_ID AS RetryTrgetId , ORIGINAL_AT AS OriginalAt , CONVERT(CHAR(19), START_DT, 21) AS StartDt , CONVERT(CHAR(19), END_DT, 21) AS EndDt , EXECUT_TM AS ExecutTm FROM TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST WHERE (JOBS_ID = #{jobsId} OR RETRY_TRGET_ID = #{jobsId}) AND (SELECT TOP 1 ORIGINAL_AT FROM TB_TASK_DEVLOP_PROCESS_DEV_EXECUT_HIST WHERE JOBS_ID = #{jobsId}) = 1 ORDER BY JOBS_ID DESC
